title: How to Make Chocolate Mocha Trifles

steps.headline: Add the sugar to the whipping cream and whip until stiff peaks form.
Combine the pudding powder with the coffee granules in a small pot.
steps.description: Cook the pudding according to the package's directions. Add pudding with milk and heat until it becomes thick. Some pudding packages may require you to add some sugar.

steps.headline: Add the pudding to cool down and fold in about 1/3 of the whipped cream mixture into the pot.
Place a brownie cube in your trifle cup or bowl.

steps.headline: Repeat this layering until all ingredients are used.
Top everything with whipped cream and garnish with chopped almonds and chocolate shavings.
Chill for one hour in the refrigerator before serving.

text:
Add the sugar to the whipping cream and whip until stiff peaks form. Combine the pudding powder with the coffee granules in a small pot. Cook the pudding according to the package's directions. Add pudding with milk and heat until it becomes thick. Some pudding packages may require you to add some sugar. Add the pudding to cool down and fold in about 1/3 of the whipped cream mixture into the pot. Place a brownie cube in your trifle cup or bowl. Layer the pudding, chopped almonds, and whipped cream on top of the brownie. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Make-Chocolate-Mocha-Trifles-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Chocolate-Mocha-Trifles-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Make-Chocolate-Mocha-Trifles-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/aid610941-v4-728px-Make-Chocolate-Mocha-Trifles-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Repeat this layering until all ingredients are used. Top everything with whipped cream and garnish with chopped almonds and chocolate shavings. Chill for one hour in the refrigerator before serving. Finished.
